message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product and I think it's a great fit for you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $13,000. What do you think?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $11,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but unfortunately $11,000 is below my minimum.  I'm willing to go down to $12,000 to make this deal work for both of us. Let me know if that's something you can work with.

I understand your position, Alice. Thank you for considering my budget. I am now offering $11,500 for the product. This is the highest amount I can afford without compromising other financial commitments. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
